entries.source: Chat Edit: 'There are some descrepancies with the workflow of club access, creation of club by admin, event creation and other event feature's workflow like event date and time for only one day and cannot extend it to multiple days, cannot enter activity points for the- event, hall booking workflow with respect to approval of booking, cannot select the event for which the hall/venue is being booked, the club creation is different from creating/registering a club organizer's account. Check the SRS and resolve the above and any other possible descrepancies and issues.'
